result.eng: Give me a drop of water please.
result.ga: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoilGive me a drop of water please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom braon uisce le do ṫoilGive me a drop of water please.

result.eng: I asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ga: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.orig: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.html: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bheanI asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ponchtml: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an ḃeanI asked the woman for a glass of water.

result.html: Tá eagla orm roimh uisceI'm scared of water.
result.ponchtml: Tá eagla orm roiṁ uisceI'm scared of water.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.html: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: Leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: They drank some of the whiskey.
result.ga: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.orig: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.html: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beathaThey drank some of the whiskey.
result.ponchtml: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beaṫaThey drank some of the whiskey.

result.ga: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.orig: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.html: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!
result.ponchtml: Tá uisce faoi ṫalaṁ éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.orig: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.html: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ponchtml: Mar ċuid den uisce faoi ṫalaṁ lofa seo cuireaḋ an prionsa i dteaċ na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.ga: Ghoil sí uisce a cinn
result.html: Ghoil sí uisce a cinnShe cried her heart out.
result.ponchtml: Ġoil sí uisce a cinnShe cried her heart out.

result.html: Tháinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.

result.ga: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.orig: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.html: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúileIt makes my eyes run.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé uisce le mo ẛúileIt makes my eyes run.

result.html: Cuireann sé uisce lena fhiaclaIt makes his mouth water.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé uisce lena ḟiaclaIt makes his mouth water.

result.ga: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féin
result.orig: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féin
result.html: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féinI'm salivating already!
result.ponchtml: Tá uisce le m'ḟiacla ċeana féinI'm salivating already!

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.html: Fásann sí in uisce tanaíIt grows in shallow water.
result.ponchtml: Fásann sí in uisce tanaíIt grows in shallow water.

result.eng: She skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ga: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce
result.orig: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce
result.html: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisceShe skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ponchtml: Ṡleaṁnaiġ sí is ṫit ar ṁullaċ a cinn isteaċ san uisceShe skidded and fell head-first into the water.

result.eng: I drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ga: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.orig: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.html: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé a ḃféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.

result.eng: Their legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ga: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.orig: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.html: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
